# Turso HTTP Reborn

This is the latest version of TursoHTTP that uses the exact same API Interface as the Turso/libSQL Native Extension for PHP. This allows developers to be more comfortable without having to learn a new interface.

This package was created specifically for Remote Connection use, which is one of the features of Turso Database.

![Features](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/32319439/350552534-d0904d04-dbc5-4f54-b56a-319e6c2cb2f6.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..2ha6FMPA7DSmLy6v2G1H4umqUfcLgyLutXt9KPsbkkQ)

- **[libSQL Native Extension](https://github.com/tursodatabase/turso-client-php)** like API Interface
- [Turso Platform API](/docs/PlatformAPI)
- [Schema Builder](/docs/ShcemaBuilder.md)
- [Query Builder](/docs/QueryBuilder.md)
- [Timezone Support](/docs/TimezoneSupport.md)
